Name: Emu War!
About the game: Experience Australiaâ€™s most brutal war in this action-packed, guaranteed historically accurate depiction of the great Emu War! Either play as an Australian soldier on the front lines against the emu menace or invade and decimate crops and humans alike as an enraged emu in both open world sandbox environments and varied smaller scale skirmishes! Access a variety of different gameplay through power ups and upgrades with in-game credit earned with each kill. Use a variety of vehicles and air craft in your quest for dominance. Create your own battles and experiments using characters, weapons and vehicles unlocked with your campaign successes in Architect Mode. Accept no substitutes!
